project.name: Taverna 2 workbench virtual build tree
project.description: Build tree for all of Taverna 2 using svn:externals. It is normally recommended to check out only the needed individual projects separately as nightly snapshots of all modules are build automatically by Hudson at http://www.mygrid.org.uk/hudson/ and deployed to our snapshot repository at http://www.mygrid.org.uk/maven/snapshot-repository/.
